logout.title: Do you want to logout ?
logout.loggedOut: You cancelled logout, you are still logged in

policy.title: Privacy policy and register description
policy.purpose: The purpose of this privacy policy is to tell you what kind of data we collect of our website users, how we use this data, and how it is protected.
policy.forAll: For all matters related to the register, please contact by mail info.kristersoft@gmail.com
policy.keep: We keeps a register of ours user contact users for the purpose of item has been found.
policy.information: The information recorded in the register does not contain personal data unless it is necessary.
policy.contain: The register may contain the following information on user:
policy.emailShare: We do not share your email with third party
policy.user: A registered person has the right to request the correction or removal of wrong, incomplete, unnecessary, or outdated information by notifying the register controller. User information can be removed from the register upon a user’s request.
policy.service: By using our service, you agree to the handling of your data in accordance with this privacy policy.

home.text1: We will tell briefly about the software Lost & found
home.text2: The purpose of this program is you can give your item serial number for case that you lost your item. Your item founder can contact you via this software.
home.text3: Start to use this software by pressing button sign up
home.text7: Put the serial number on the item
home.text8: You can also put the serial number in your car if someone would like to tell you something about your car
home.text9: If your item is lost. The finder can contact you through our system
home.text10: Here in message sector you can reply to sender or solve your conversation

help.text7: Put the serial number on the item
help.text8: You can also put the serial number in your car if someone would like to tell you something about your car
help.ifYouWantTOsendMessageTOsupport: You can contact to support via message form
help.howToCreactItemFirstStep: Put your username and password on logIn form
help.pressPlusInput: Fill out name input other inputs are optional
help.howToUpdateInfoPress: Press my account and then press update
help.updateMyAccount: Make a changes and press save
help.text9: If your item is lost. The finder can contact you through our system
help.text10: Here in message sector you can reply to sender or solve your conversation
help.text12: Atention if you click resolve conversation, you will not be able to recover it!
help.text13: You can change your password and email

userDetailDelete.areYouSure: you're sure you want to close your account?
userDetailDelete.text: if you close your account ... it is no longer accessible by you or anyone else,and all data will be deleted and it cannot be restored!

message.title: Send message
message.name: Name
message.subject: Subject
message.message: Write your message here and max are 250 Characters *
message.messageToSupport: Write your message here and max are 1500 Characters *
message.itemOwner: Do you want to contact item's owner ?
message.weDoNotShare: We will not share your email with item's owner or anyone else
message.weSendSerialNumber: Put email that is in use because we will send you link that you could start conversation with item's owner

register.title: Create New Account
register.name: Name
register.usernameCannotBechange: Choose carefully your username because can not be change
register.weSend: Put email that is in use, because we will send you email if someone want to contact you
register.weDoNotShare: We will not share your email to anyone
